00115 
00133 MtrNode *
00134 Cudd_MakeZddTreeNode(
00135   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00136   unsigned int  low /* index of the first group variable */,
00137   unsigned int  size /* number of variables in the group */,
00138   unsigned int  type /* MTR_DEFAULT or MTR_FIXED */)
00139 {
00140     MtrNode *group;
00141     MtrNode *tree;
00142     unsigned int level;
00143 
00144     /* If the variable does not exist yet, the position is assumed to be
00145     ** the same as the index. Therefore, applications that rely on
00146     ** Cudd_bddNewVarAtLevel or Cudd_addNewVarAtLevel to create new
00147     ** variables have to create the variables before they group them.
00148     */
00149     level = (low < (unsigned int) dd->sizeZ) ? dd->permZ[low] : low;
00150 
00151     if (level + size - 1> (int) MTR_MAXHIGH)
00152         return(NULL);
00153 
00154     /* If the tree does not exist yet, create it. */
00155     tree = dd->treeZ;
00156     if (tree == NULL) {
00157         dd->treeZ = tree = Mtr_InitGroupTree(0, dd->sizeZ);
00158         if (tree == NULL)
00159             return(NULL);
00160         tree->index = dd->invpermZ[0];
00161     }
00162 
00163     /* Extend the upper bound of the tree if necessary. This allows the
00164     ** application to create groups even before the variables are created.
00165     */
00166     tree->size = ddMax(tree->size, level + size);
00167 
00168     /* Create the group. */
00169     group = Mtr_MakeGroup(tree, level, size, type);
00170     if (group == NULL)
00171         return(NULL);
00172 
00173     /* Initialize the index field to the index of the variable currently
00174     ** in position low. This field will be updated by the reordering
00175     ** procedure to provide a handle to the group once it has been moved.
00176     */
00177     group->index = (MtrHalfWord) low;
00178 
00179     return(group);
00180 
00181 } /* end of Cudd_MakeZddTreeNode */

00202 int
00203 cuddZddTreeSifting(
00204   DdManager * table /* DD table */,
00205   Cudd_ReorderingType method /* reordering method for the groups of leaves */)
00206 {
00207     int i;
00208     int nvars;
00209     int result;
00210     int tempTree;
00211 
00212     /* If no tree is provided we create a temporary one in which all
00213     ** variables are in a single group. After reordering this tree is
00214     ** destroyed.
00215     */
00216     tempTree = table->treeZ == NULL;
00217     if (tempTree) {
00218         table->treeZ = Mtr_InitGroupTree(0,table->sizeZ);
00219         table->treeZ->index = table->invpermZ[0];
00220     }
00221     nvars = table->sizeZ;
00222 
00223 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00224     if (pr > 0 && !tempTree) (void) fprintf(stdout,"cuddZddTreeSifting:");
00225     Mtr_PrintGroups(table->treeZ,pr <= 0);
00226 #endif
00227 
00228 #ifdef DD_STATS
00229     extsymmcalls = 0;
00230     extsymm = 0;
00231     secdiffcalls = 0;
00232     secdiff = 0;
00233     secdiffmisfire = 0;
00234 
00235     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00236     if (!tempTree)
00237         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:IM_NODES  %8d: group tree nodes\n",
00238                        zddCountInternalMtrNodes(table,table->treeZ));
00239 #endif
00240 
00241     /* Initialize the group of each subtable to itself. Initially
00242     ** there are no groups. Groups are created according to the tree
00243     ** structure in postorder fashion.
00244     */
00245     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++)
00246         table->subtableZ[i].next = i;
00247 
00248     /* Reorder. */
00249     result = zddTreeSiftingAux(table, table->treeZ, method);
00250 
00251 #ifdef DD_STATS         /* print stats */
00252     if (!tempTree && method == CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT &&
00253         (table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7 ||
00254          table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK5)) {
00255         (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nextsymmcalls = %d\n",extsymmcalls);
00256         (void) fprintf(stdout,"extsymm = %d",extsymm);
00257     }
00258     if (!tempTree && method == CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT &&
00259         table->groupcheck == CUDD_GROUP_CHECK7) {
00260         (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nsecdiffcalls = %d\n",secdiffcalls);
00261         (void) fprintf(stdout,"secdiff = %d\n",secdiff);
00262         (void) fprintf(stdout,"secdiffmisfire = %d",secdiffmisfire);
00263     }
00264 #endif
00265 
00266     if (tempTree)
00267         Cudd_FreeZddTree(table);
00268     return(result);
00269 
00270 } /* end of cuddZddTreeSifting */

00288 static int
00289 zddTreeSiftingAux(
00290   DdManager * table,
00291   MtrNode * treenode,
00292   Cudd_ReorderingType method)
00293 {
00294     MtrNode  *auxnode;
00295     int res;
00296 
00297 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00298     Mtr_PrintGroups(treenode,1);
00299 #endif
00300 
00301     auxnode = treenode;
00302     while (auxnode != NULL) {
00303         if (auxnode->child != NULL) {
00304             if (!zddTreeSiftingAux(table, auxnode->child, method))
00305                 return(0);
00306             res = zddReorderChildren(table, auxnode, CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT);
00307             if (res == 0)
00308                 return(0);
00309         } else if (auxnode->size > 1) {
00310             if (!zddReorderChildren(table, auxnode, method))
00311                 return(0);
00312         }
00313         auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00314     }
00315 
00316     return(1);
00317 
00318 } /* end of zddTreeSiftingAux */

00332 static int
00333 zddCountInternalMtrNodes(
00334   DdManager * table,
00335   MtrNode * treenode)
00336 {
00337     MtrNode *auxnode;
00338     int     count,nodeCount;
00339 
00340 
00341     nodeCount = 0;
00342     auxnode = treenode;
00343     while (auxnode != NULL) {
00344         if (!(MTR_TEST(auxnode,MTR_TERMINAL))) {
00345             nodeCount++;
00346             count = zddCountInternalMtrNodes(table,auxnode->child);
00347             nodeCount += count;
00348         }
00349         auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00350     }
00351 
00352     return(nodeCount);
00353 
00354 } /* end of zddCountInternalMtrNodes */
00355 #endif

00357 
00372 static int
00373 zddReorderChildren(
00374   DdManager * table,
00375   MtrNode * treenode,
00376   Cudd_ReorderingType method)
00377 {
00378     int lower;
00379     int upper;
00380     int result;
00381     unsigned int initialSize;
00382 
00383     zddFindNodeHiLo(table,treenode,&lower,&upper);
00384     /* If upper == -1 these variables do not exist yet. */
00385     if (upper == -1)
00386         return(1);
00387 
00388     if (treenode->flags == MTR_FIXED) {
00389         result = 1;
00390     } else {
00391 #ifdef DD_STATS
00392         (void) fprintf(stdout," ");
00393 #endif
00394         switch (method) {
00395         case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM:
00396         case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM_PIVOT:
00397             result = cuddZddSwapping(table,lower,upper,method);
00398             break;
00399         case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT:
00400             result = cuddZddSifting(table,lower,upper);
00401             break;
00402         case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT_CONVERGE:
00403             do {
00404                 initialSize = table->keysZ;
00405                 result = cuddZddSifting(table,lower,upper);
00406                 if (initialSize <= table->keysZ)
00407                     break;
00408 #ifdef DD_STATS
00409                 else
00410                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00411 #endif
00412             } while (result != 0);
00413             break;
00414         case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT:
00415             result = cuddZddSymmSifting(table,lower,upper);
00416             break;
00417         case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT_CONV:
00418             result = cuddZddSymmSiftingConv(table,lower,upper);
00419             break;
00420         case CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT:
00421             result = zddGroupSifting(table,lower,upper);
00422             break;
00423         case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR:
00424             result = cuddZddLinearSifting(table,lower,upper);
00425             break;
00426         case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR_CONVERGE:
00427             do {
00428                 initialSize = table->keysZ;
00429                 result = cuddZddLinearSifting(table,lower,upper);
00430                 if (initialSize <= table->keysZ)
00431                     break;
00432 #ifdef DD_STATS
00433                 else
00434                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00435 #endif
00436             } while (result != 0);
00437             break;
00438         default:
00439             return(0);
00440         }
00441     }
00442 
00443     /* Create a single group for all the variables that were sifted,
00444     ** so that they will be treated as a single block by successive
00445     ** invocations of zddGroupSifting.
00446     */
00447     zddMergeGroups(table,treenode,lower,upper);
00448 
00449 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00450     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddReorderChildren:");
00451 #endif
00452 
00453     return(result);
00454 
00455 } /* end of zddReorderChildren */
00456 
00457 
00473 static void
00474 zddFindNodeHiLo(
00475   DdManager * table,
00476   MtrNode * treenode,
00477   int * lower,
00478   int * upper)
00479 {
00480     int low;
00481     int high;
00482 
00483     /* Check whether no variables in this group already exist.
00484     ** If so, return immediately. The calling procedure will know from
00485     ** the values of upper that no reordering is needed.
00486     */
00487     if ((int) treenode->low >= table->sizeZ) {
00488         *lower = table->sizeZ;
00489         *upper = -1;
00490         return;
00491     }
00492 
00493     *lower = low = (unsigned int) table->permZ[treenode->index];
00494     high = (int) (low + treenode->size - 1);
00495 
00496     if (high >= table->sizeZ) {
00497         /* This is the case of a partially existing group. The aim is to
00498         ** reorder as many variables as safely possible.  If the tree
00499         ** node is terminal, we just reorder the subset of the group
00500         ** that is currently in existence.  If the group has
00501         ** subgroups, then we only reorder those subgroups that are
00502         ** fully instantiated.  This way we avoid breaking up a group.
00503         */
00504         MtrNode *auxnode = treenode->child;
00505         if (auxnode == NULL) {
00506             *upper = (unsigned int) table->sizeZ - 1;
00507         } else {
00508             /* Search the subgroup that strands the table->sizeZ line.
00509             ** If the first group starts at 0 and goes past table->sizeZ
00510             ** upper will get -1, thus correctly signaling that no reordering
00511             ** should take place.
00512             */
00513             while (auxnode != NULL) {
00514                 int thisLower = table->permZ[auxnode->low];
00515                 int thisUpper = thisLower + auxnode->size - 1;
00516                 if (thisUpper >= table->sizeZ && thisLower < table->sizeZ)
00517                     *upper = (unsigned int) thisLower - 1;
00518                 auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00519             }
00520         }
00521     } else {
00522         /* Normal case: All the variables of the group exist. */
00523         *upper = (unsigned int) high;
00524     }
00525 
00526 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00527     /* Make sure that all variables in group are contiguous. */
00528     assert(treenode->size >= *upper - *lower + 1);
00529 #endif
00530 
00531     return;
00532 
00533 } /* end of zddFindNodeHiLo */
00534

00548 static int
00549 zddUniqueCompareGroup(
00550   int * ptrX,
00551   int * ptrY)
00552 {
00553 #if 0
00554     if (entry[*ptrY] == entry[*ptrX]) {
00555         return((*ptrX) - (*ptrY));
00556     }
00557 #endif
00558     return(entry[*ptrY] - entry[*ptrX]);
00559 
00560 } /* end of zddUniqueCompareGroup */
00561 
00562 
00576 static int
00577 zddGroupSifting(
00578   DdManager * table,
00579   int  lower,
00580   int  upper)
00581 {
00582     int         *var;
00583     int         i,j,x,xInit;
00584     int         nvars;
00585     int         classes;
00586     int         result;
00587     int         *sifted;
00588 #ifdef DD_STATS
00589     unsigned    previousSize;
00590 #endif
00591     int         xindex;
00592 
00593     nvars = table->sizeZ;
00594 
00595     /* Order variables to sift. */
00596     entry = NULL;
00597     sifted = NULL;
00598     var = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00599     if (var == NULL) {
00600         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00601         goto zddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00602     }
00603     entry = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00604     if (entry == NULL) {
00605         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00606         goto zddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00607     }
00608     sifted = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00609     if (sifted == NULL) {
00610         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00611         goto zddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00612     }
00613 
00614     /* Here we consider only one representative for each group. */
00615     for (i = 0, classes = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00616         sifted[i] = 0;
00617         x = table->permZ[i];
00618         if ((unsigned) x >= table->subtableZ[x].next) {
00619             entry[i] = table->subtableZ[x].keys;
00620             var[classes] = i;
00621             classes++;
00622         }
00623     }
00624 
00625     qsort((void *)var,classes,sizeof(int),(int (*)(const void *, const void *))zddUniqueCompareGroup);
00626 
00627     /* Now sift. */
00628     for (i = 0; i < ddMin(table->siftMaxVar,classes); i++) {
00629         if (zddTotalNumberSwapping >= table->siftMaxSwap)
00630             break;
00631         xindex = var[i];
00632         if (sifted[xindex] == 1) /* variable already sifted as part of group */
00633             continue;
00634         x = table->permZ[xindex]; /* find current level of this variable */
00635         if (x < lower || x > upper)
00636             continue;
00637 #ifdef DD_STATS
00638         previousSize = table->keysZ;
00639 #endif
00640 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00641         /* x is bottom of group */
00642         assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtableZ[x].next);
00643 #endif
00644         result = zddGroupSiftingAux(table,x,lower,upper);
00645         if (!result) goto zddGroupSiftingOutOfMem;
00646 
00647 #ifdef DD_STATS
00648         if (table->keysZ < previousSize) {
00649             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00650         } else if (table->keysZ > previousSize) {
00651             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+");
00652         } else {
00653             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00654         }
00655         fflush(stdout);
00656 #endif
00657 
00658         /* Mark variables in the group just sifted. */
00659         x = table->permZ[xindex];
00660         if ((unsigned) x != table->subtableZ[x].next) {
00661             xInit = x;
00662             do {
00663                 j = table->invpermZ[x];
00664                 sifted[j] = 1;
00665                 x = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00666             } while (x != xInit);
00667         }
00668 
00669 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00670         if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupSifting:");
00671 #endif
00672     } /* for */
00673 
00674     FREE(sifted);
00675     FREE(var);
00676     FREE(entry);
00677 
00678     return(1);
00679 
00680 zddGroupSiftingOutOfMem:
00681     if (entry != NULL)  FREE(entry);
00682     if (var != NULL)    FREE(var);
00683     if (sifted != NULL) FREE(sifted);
00684 
00685     return(0);
00686 
00687 } /* end of zddGroupSifting */
00688 
00689 
00705 static int
00706 zddGroupSiftingAux(
00707   DdManager * table,
00708   int  x,
00709   int  xLow,
00710   int  xHigh)
00711 {
00712     Move *move;
00713     Move *moves;        /* list of moves */
00714     int  initialSize;
00715     int  result;
00716 
00717 
00718 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00719     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupSiftingAux from %d to %d\n",xLow,xHigh);
00720     assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtableZ[x].next); /* x is bottom of group */
00721 #endif
00722 
00723     initialSize = table->keysZ;
00724     moves = NULL;
00725 
00726     if (x == xLow) { /* Sift down */
00727 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00728         /* x must be a singleton */
00729         assert((unsigned) x == table->subtableZ[x].next);
00730 #endif
00731         if (x == xHigh) return(1);      /* just one variable */
00732 
00733         if (!zddGroupSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,&moves))
00734             goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00735         /* at this point x == xHigh, unless early term */
00736 
00737         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00738         result = zddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00739 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00740         assert(table->keysZ <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00741 #endif
00742         if (!result) goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00743 
00744     } else if (cuddZddNextHigh(table,x) > xHigh) { /* Sift up */
00745 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00746         /* x is bottom of group */
00747         assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtableZ[x].next);
00748 #endif
00749         /* Find top of x's group */
00750         x = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00751 
00752         if (!zddGroupSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,&moves))
00753             goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00754         /* at this point x == xLow, unless early term */
00755 
00756         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00757         result = zddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00758 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00759         assert(table->keysZ <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00760 #endif
00761         if (!result) goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00762 
00763     } else if (x - xLow > xHigh - x) { /* must go down first: shorter */
00764         if (!zddGroupSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,&moves))
00765             goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00766         /* at this point x == xHigh, unless early term */
00767 
00768         /* Find top of group */
00769         if (moves) {
00770             x = moves->y;
00771         }
00772         while ((unsigned) x < table->subtableZ[x].next)
00773             x = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00774         x = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00775 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00776         /* x should be the top of a group */
00777         assert((unsigned) x <= table->subtableZ[x].next);
00778 #endif
00779 
00780         if (!zddGroupSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,&moves))
00781             goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00782 
00783         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00784         result = zddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00785 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00786         assert(table->keysZ <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00787 #endif
00788         if (!result) goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00789 
00790     } else { /* moving up first: shorter */
00791         /* Find top of x's group */
00792         x = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00793 
00794         if (!zddGroupSiftingUp(table,x,xLow,&moves))
00795             goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00796         /* at this point x == xHigh, unless early term */
00797 
00798         if (moves) {
00799             x = moves->x;
00800         }
00801         while ((unsigned) x < table->subtableZ[x].next)
00802             x = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00803 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00804         /* x is bottom of a group */
00805         assert((unsigned) x >= table->subtableZ[x].next);
00806 #endif
00807 
00808         if (!zddGroupSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh,&moves))
00809             goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00810 
00811         /* move backward and stop at best position */
00812         result = zddGroupSiftingBackward(table,moves,initialSize);
00813 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00814         assert(table->keysZ <= (unsigned) initialSize);
00815 #endif
00816         if (!result) goto zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
00817     }
00818 
00819     while (moves != NULL) {
00820         move = moves->next;
00821         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00822         moves = move;
00823     }
00824 
00825     return(1);
00826 
00827 zddGroupSiftingAuxOutOfMem:
00828     while (moves != NULL) {
00829         move = moves->next;
00830         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00831         moves = move;
00832     }
00833 
00834     return(0);
00835 
00836 } /* end of zddGroupSiftingAux */
00837 
00838 
00854 static int
00855 zddGroupSiftingUp(
00856   DdManager * table,
00857   int  y,
00858   int  xLow,
00859   Move ** moves)
00860 {
00861     Move *move;
00862     int  x;
00863     int  size;
00864     int  gxtop;
00865     int  limitSize;
00866     int  xindex, yindex;
00867 
00868     yindex = table->invpermZ[y];
00869 
00870     limitSize = table->keysZ;
00871 
00872     x = cuddZddNextLow(table,y);
00873     while (x >= xLow) {
00874         gxtop = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00875         if (table->subtableZ[x].next == (unsigned) x &&
00876             table->subtableZ[y].next == (unsigned) y) {
00877             /* x and y are self groups */
00878             xindex = table->invpermZ[x];
00879             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
00880 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00881             assert(table->subtableZ[x].next == (unsigned) x);
00882             assert(table->subtableZ[y].next == (unsigned) y);
00883 #endif
00884             if (size == 0) goto zddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00885             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00886             if (move == NULL) goto zddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00887             move->x = x;
00888             move->y = y;
00889             move->flags = MTR_DEFAULT;
00890             move->size = size;
00891             move->next = *moves;
00892             *moves = move;
00893 
00894 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00895             if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupSiftingUp (2 single groups):\n");
00896 #endif
00897             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
00898                 return(1);
00899             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
00900         } else { /* group move */
00901             size = zddGroupMove(table,x,y,moves);
00902             if (size == 0) goto zddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem;
00903             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
00904                 return(1);
00905             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
00906         }
00907         y = gxtop;
00908         x = cuddZddNextLow(table,y);
00909     }
00910 
00911     return(1);
00912 
00913 zddGroupSiftingUpOutOfMem:
00914     while (*moves != NULL) {
00915         move = (*moves)->next;
00916         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) *moves);
00917         *moves = move;
00918     }
00919     return(0);
00920 
00921 } /* end of zddGroupSiftingUp */
00922 
00923 
00935 static int
00936 zddGroupSiftingDown(
00937   DdManager * table,
00938   int  x,
00939   int  xHigh,
00940   Move ** moves)
00941 {
00942     Move *move;
00943     int  y;
00944     int  size;
00945     int  limitSize;
00946     int  gxtop,gybot;
00947     int  xindex;
00948 
00949 
00950     /* Initialize R */
00951     xindex = table->invpermZ[x];
00952     gxtop = table->subtableZ[x].next;
00953     limitSize = size = table->keysZ;
00954     y = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
00955     while (y <= xHigh) {
00956         /* Find bottom of y group. */
00957         gybot = table->subtableZ[y].next;
00958         while (table->subtableZ[gybot].next != (unsigned) y)
00959             gybot = table->subtableZ[gybot].next;
00960 
00961         if (table->subtableZ[x].next == (unsigned) x &&
00962             table->subtableZ[y].next == (unsigned) y) {
00963             /* x and y are self groups */
00964             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
00965 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00966             assert(table->subtableZ[x].next == (unsigned) x);
00967             assert(table->subtableZ[y].next == (unsigned) y);
00968 #endif
00969             if (size == 0) goto zddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
00970 
00971             /* Record move. */
00972             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00973             if (move == NULL) goto zddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
00974             move->x = x;
00975             move->y = y;
00976             move->flags = MTR_DEFAULT;
00977             move->size = size;
00978             move->next = *moves;
00979             *moves = move;
00980 
00981 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00982             if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupSiftingDown (2 single groups):\n");
00983 #endif
00984             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
00985                 return(1);
00986             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
00987             x = y;
00988             y = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
00989         } else { /* Group move */
00990             size = zddGroupMove(table,x,y,moves);
00991             if (size == 0) goto zddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem;
00992             if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
00993                 return(1);
00994             if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
00995         }
00996         x = gybot;
00997         y = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
00998     }
00999 
01000     return(1);
01001 
01002 zddGroupSiftingDownOutOfMem:
01003     while (*moves != NULL) {
01004         move = (*moves)->next;
01005         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) *moves);
01006         *moves = move;
01007     }
01008 
01009     return(0);
01010 
01011 } /* end of zddGroupSiftingDown */
01012 
01013 
01024 static int
01025 zddGroupMove(
01026   DdManager * table,
01027   int  x,
01028   int  y,
01029   Move ** moves)
01030 {
01031     Move *move;
01032     int  size;
01033     int  i,j,xtop,xbot,xsize,ytop,ybot,ysize,newxtop;
01034     int  swapx = 0, swapy = 0;
01035 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01036     int  initialSize,bestSize;
01037 #endif
01038 
01039 #if DD_DEBUG
01040     /* We assume that x < y */
01041     assert(x < y);
01042 #endif
01043     /* Find top, bottom, and size for the two groups. */
01044     xbot = x;
01045     xtop = table->subtableZ[x].next;
01046     xsize = xbot - xtop + 1;
01047     ybot = y;
01048     while ((unsigned) ybot < table->subtableZ[ybot].next)
01049         ybot = table->subtableZ[ybot].next;
01050     ytop = y;
01051     ysize = ybot - ytop + 1;
01052 
01053 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01054     initialSize = bestSize = table->keysZ;
01055 #endif
01056     /* Sift the variables of the second group up through the first group */
01057     for (i = 1; i <= ysize; i++) {
01058         for (j = 1; j <= xsize; j++) {
01059             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01060             if (size == 0) goto zddGroupMoveOutOfMem;
01061 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01062             if (size < bestSize)
01063                 bestSize = size;
01064 #endif
01065             swapx = x; swapy = y;
01066             y = x;
01067             x = cuddZddNextLow(table,y);
01068         }
01069         y = ytop + i;
01070         x = cuddZddNextLow(table,y);
01071     }
01072 #if defined(DD_DEBUG) && defined(DD_VERBOSE)
01073     if ((bestSize < initialSize) && (bestSize < size))
01074         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Missed local minimum: initialSize:%d  bestSize:%d  finalSize:%d\n",initialSize,bestSize,size);
01075 #endif
01076 
01077     /* fix groups */
01078     y = xtop; /* ytop is now where xtop used to be */
01079     for (i = 0; i < ysize - 1; i++) {
01080         table->subtableZ[y].next = cuddZddNextHigh(table,y);
01081         y = cuddZddNextHigh(table,y);
01082     }
01083     table->subtableZ[y].next = xtop; /* y is bottom of its group, join */
01084                                     /* it to top of its group */
01085     x = cuddZddNextHigh(table,y);
01086     newxtop = x;
01087     for (i = 0; i < xsize - 1; i++) {
01088         table->subtableZ[x].next = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
01089         x = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
01090     }
01091     table->subtableZ[x].next = newxtop; /* x is bottom of its group, join */
01092                                     /* it to top of its group */
01093 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01094     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupMove:\n");
01095 #endif
01096 
01097     /* Store group move */
01098     move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01099     if (move == NULL) goto zddGroupMoveOutOfMem;
01100     move->x = swapx;
01101     move->y = swapy;
01102     move->flags = MTR_DEFAULT;
01103     move->size = table->keysZ;
01104     move->next = *moves;
01105     *moves = move;
01106 
01107     return(table->keysZ);
01108 
01109 zddGroupMoveOutOfMem:
01110     while (*moves != NULL) {
01111         move = (*moves)->next;
01112         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) *moves);
01113         *moves = move;
01114     }
01115     return(0);
01116 
01117 } /* end of zddGroupMove */
01118 
01119 
01130 static int
01131 zddGroupMoveBackward(
01132   DdManager * table,
01133   int  x,
01134   int  y)
01135 {
01136     int size;
01137     int i,j,xtop,xbot,xsize,ytop,ybot,ysize,newxtop;
01138 
01139 
01140 #if DD_DEBUG
01141     /* We assume that x < y */
01142     assert(x < y);
01143 #endif
01144 
01145     /* Find top, bottom, and size for the two groups. */
01146     xbot = x;
01147     xtop = table->subtableZ[x].next;
01148     xsize = xbot - xtop + 1;
01149     ybot = y;
01150     while ((unsigned) ybot < table->subtableZ[ybot].next)
01151         ybot = table->subtableZ[ybot].next;
01152     ytop = y;
01153     ysize = ybot - ytop + 1;
01154 
01155     /* Sift the variables of the second group up through the first group */
01156     for (i = 1; i <= ysize; i++) {
01157         for (j = 1; j <= xsize; j++) {
01158             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01159             if (size == 0)
01160                 return(0);
01161             y = x;
01162             x = cuddZddNextLow(table,y);
01163         }
01164         y = ytop + i;
01165         x = cuddZddNextLow(table,y);
01166     }
01167 
01168     /* fix groups */
01169     y = xtop;
01170     for (i = 0; i < ysize - 1; i++) {
01171         table->subtableZ[y].next = cuddZddNextHigh(table,y);
01172         y = cuddZddNextHigh(table,y);
01173     }
01174     table->subtableZ[y].next = xtop; /* y is bottom of its group, join */
01175                                     /* to its top */
01176     x = cuddZddNextHigh(table,y);
01177     newxtop = x;
01178     for (i = 0; i < xsize - 1; i++) {
01179         table->subtableZ[x].next = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
01180         x = cuddZddNextHigh(table,x);
01181     }
01182     table->subtableZ[x].next = newxtop; /* x is bottom of its group, join */
01183                                     /* to its top */
01184 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01185     if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupMoveBackward:\n");
01186 #endif
01187 
01188     return(1);
01189 
01190 } /* end of zddGroupMoveBackward */
01191 
01192 
01204 static int
01205 zddGroupSiftingBackward(
01206   DdManager * table,
01207   Move * moves,
01208   int  size)
01209 {
01210     Move *move;
01211     int  res;
01212 
01213 
01214     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
01215         if (move->size < size) {
01216             size = move->size;
01217         }
01218     }
01219 
01220     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
01221         if (move->size == size) return(1);
01222         if ((table->subtableZ[move->x].next == move->x) &&
01223         (table->subtableZ[move->y].next == move->y)) {
01224             res = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
01225             if (!res) return(0);
01226 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01227             if (pr > 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"zddGroupSiftingBackward:\n");
01228             assert(table->subtableZ[move->x].next == move->x);
01229             assert(table->subtableZ[move->y].next == move->y);
01230 #endif
01231         } else { /* Group move necessary */
01232             res = zddGroupMoveBackward(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
01233             if (!res) return(0);
01234         }
01235     }
01236 
01237     return(1);
01238 
01239 } /* end of zddGroupSiftingBackward */
01240 
01241 
01252 static void
01253 zddMergeGroups(
01254   DdManager * table,
01255   MtrNode * treenode,
01256   int  low,
01257   int  high)
01258 {
01259     int i;
01260     MtrNode *auxnode;
01261     int saveindex;
01262     int newindex;
01263 
01264     if (treenode != table->treeZ) {
01265         for (i = low; i < high; i++)
01266             table->subtableZ[i].next = i+1;
01267         table->subtableZ[high].next = low;
01268     }
01269 
01270     saveindex = treenode->index;
01271     newindex = table->invpermZ[low];
01272     auxnode = treenode;
01273     do {
01274         auxnode->index = newindex;
01275         if (auxnode->parent == NULL ||
01276                 (int) auxnode->parent->index != saveindex)
01277             break;
01278         auxnode = auxnode->parent;
01279     } while (1);
01280     return;
01281 
01282 } /* end of zddMergeGroups */
